data.name: Project Grove
data.detailed_description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1629470

Project Grove is a first-person adventure puzzle game set in a magical wild forest during an industrial Steampunk era.

JUMP ON YOUR BEST FRIEND'S HEAD

Your robot companion L-P1N, is your travel guide, best friend and placeable platform. Cross crevasses, dodge descending boulders and discover L-P1N's other hidden abilities. Jumping on your best friend's head has never been so useful.

EXPLORE EXOTIC DACRIMA

From musky autumnal Wetlands, to deep dark crystal caves, you'll find the most bizarre magical Flora & Fauna in Dacrima. Whether that's irate cockney spiders or a pair of gaggling rocks, expect the unexpected along the way.

BREW NEW ABILITIES

As a legendary alchemist, you'll collect exotic ingredients from magical flora and combine them into potions. Each one grants new abilities and skills; affecting you, L-P1N and your surroundings. Cast crystal lasers, ride a carpet of clouds across the sky and more!

QUIRKY CHARACTERS IN MIDST OF A PANDEMIC

Ever found yourself under pressure to discover a cure to a deadly pandemic whilst the whole Empire counts on you, only to be nagged and berated by corporate Potentium Inc. hotshots? You're too busy finding new feathers for your bed & calming abusive house plants to deal with this!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1629470

data.short_description: Explore the open-world forest of Dacrima as legendary alchemist Edric Tate, with your plucky robot companion L-P1N! Forage for strange ingredients to craft whacky potions in your search for a cure to The Great Rot - all whilst trying to survive.
data.reviews:
“Really impresses with its gorgeous visuals, chilled out atmosphere and creative puzzle design.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

“Project Grove feels like a delightfully low-stakes, all-ages adventure that anyone could enjoy.”
Game Critics

“You will have to think a little outside the box to get through this section and it is a good precursor to what they could do with a full-sized title.”
Game Tyrant

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7300HQCPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
